code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import qualifications from'../files/qualifications.json';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QualificationListComponent=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{setData(qualifications);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',marginTop:'50px'},children:data.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',width:'100%',marginBottom:index<data.length-1?'16px':0},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"educationDate",style:{flex:'1',textAlign:'left'},children:card.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"educationTextBlock",style:{flex:'3',textAlign:'left',marginLeft:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"educationTitle",style:{fontWeight:'bold',fontSize:'15px'},children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"educationText",children:card.description})]})]},card.id))});};export default QualificationListComponent;
